S

setDescription(String) - Method in class plafar.domain.Item
This method is used to set a new description for the item
setItemId(int) - Method in class plafar.domain.Bill
This is used to set a new item to the bill
setName(String) - Method in class plafar.domain.Item
This method is used to set the name of the item
setPrice(float) - Method in class plafar.domain.Bill
This method is used to set a new price of the item from the bill
setPrice(float) - Method in class plafar.domain.StoreItem
This method is used to set a new price for the item
setQuantity(int) - Method in class plafar.domain.Bill
This method is used to set a new quantity of sold items to the bill
setQuantity(int) - Method in class plafar.domain.StoreItem
This method is used to set a new quantity of items in store
StoreItem - Class in plafar.domain
This is an extension class of Item designed to be used for Plafar application because it expresses more the real properities of an item from the store.
StoreItem() - Constructor for class plafar.domain.StoreItem
Initializes an empty store item
StoreItem(int, String, String, float, int) - Constructor for class plafar.domain.StoreItem
Initializes an store item with id, name, description, price and quantity
StoreItem(Item, float, int) - Constructor for class plafar.domain.StoreItem
Initializes an store item with an item object and his price and quantity
